Question
========

When the population distribution of a variable is skewed to the right, the sampling distribution of the mean of this variable in a large sample will approximate a

Answerlist
----------

* Have a binomial distribution.
* Have normal distribution.
* Have distribution that is also skewed to the right.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Have binomial distribution..: Incorrect
* Have normal distribution: Correct
* Have distribution that is also skewed to the right:: Incorrect
